title: BANNER Promotional Products font
content:

author: hernando

comments.content:
Hello Miguel,

this could be a diabolically squooshed [Bible Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417182732/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=bible+script&sample_text=BANNER).  
F
